screen.name: InfoBarSeparatelyClock
screen.applet: from enigma import ePoint from Components.config import config self.onAnimationEnd = [] if config.misc.enableAnimationAddInfobar.value: start_x = config.usage.addedinfobar_offposition_x.value start_y = config.usage.addedinfobar_offposition_y.value end_x = config.usage.addedinfobar_standartposition_x.value end_y = config.usage.addedinfobar_standartposition_y.value self.instance.startMoveAnimation(ePoint(start_x,start_y), ePoint(end_x,end_y), -9, 1, 10) else: x = config.usage.addedinfobar_standartposition_x.value y = config.usage.addedinfobar_standartposition_y.value self.instance.move(ePoint(x,y))

from enigma import ePoint if config.misc.enableAnimationAddInfobar.value: self.onAnimationEnd.append(self.instance.hide) self.onAnimationEnd.append(self.restoreAlpha) start_x = config.usage.addedinfobar_standartposition_x.value start_y = config.usage.addedinfobar_standartposition_y.value end_x = config.usage.addedinfobar_offposition_x.value end_y = config.usage.addedinfobar_offposition_y.value self.instance.startMoveAnimation(ePoint(start_x,start_y), ePoint(end_x,end_y), -9, 1, 10) self.shown = False

screen.name: SeekBarMusic
screen.applet: self.instance.move(self.parent.instance.position()) pixmap = self.parent.getCoverArt().getCoverArtPixmap() if pixmap: self.widgets["coverArtL"].instance.setPixmap(pixmap.__deref__()) self.widgets["coverArtR"].instance.setPixmap(pixmap.__deref__())

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
#orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() #orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 35, textsize[1] + 7)
if (53 > textsize[1]): textsize = (textsize[0], 53)
wsizex = 12 + 100 + textsize[0] + 20 + 12 wsizey = 52 + 40 + textsize[1] + 20 + 12
if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey = 52 + 40 + textsize[1] + 20 + 100 + 20 + 12
if (674 > wsizex): wsizex = 674
# resize wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list self["list"].instance.move(ePoint((wsizex - 485 - 24)/2, wsizey -52 - 100 - 20 - 12))
# center window # newwidth = wsize[0] # self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MovieSelection
screen.title: Select a movie

screen.name: TocSelector
screen.applet: from enigma import ePoint from Components.config import config self.instance.move(ePoint(183,config.usage.infobar_standartposition.value - 195))
